name: Uchiha Necklace
description: A necklace passed down through the Uchiha clan. It is said to enhance the wearer's perception and reflexes.

name: The Sage Cloak
description: A cloak worn by the sages of Mount Myoboku. It is imbued with natural energy, granting the wearer enhanced durability and chakra control.

name: The Sword of Kusanagi
description: A legendary sword wielded by Orochimaru. It is said to be able to cut through anything.

name: Gara's Gourd
description: A gourd filled with sand that is controlled by the user's will. It can be used for both offense and defense.

name: Infinity
description: The ultimate defense. It is said that nothing can touch the wearer.

name: The Founding Titan
description: The power of the titans. Grants immense power, but at a great cost.

name: Ryomen Sukuna's Finger
description: A cursed object that grants the user immense power, but at a great cost.

name: Goku's Pole
description: A magical pole that can extend to any length.

name: Death Note
description: A notebook that kills anyone whose name is written inside.

name: Pocket Watch
description: A mysterious watch that seems to hum with the energy of time itself. It is said to have the power to revert fate.
